text: The Wall is the eleventh album by English progressive rock band Pink Floyd. It is a concept album that tells the story of Pink, a depressed rock star that uses his past traumas to build a mental wall of isolation to separate himself from the rest of the world. The album was made into a movie in 1982, and is one of the best selling albums of all time. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:Pink Floyd albums Category:Concept albums Category:Progressive rock albums
title: The Wall
